about_the_game:
Flashback Dream is a retro-modern pixel art action-adventure game. Players step into the role of Jin, a protagonist who finds himself lost in the mysterious realm of Adonis. As Jin, you'll explore the vast landscapes of this strange world, uncovering clues that may lead him back to his original world.

Adventure
Explore various towns and sprawling forests, searching for clues to escape this enigmatic world. Speaking with the residents you meet along the way may reveal vital secrets about Adonis, bringing you closer to understanding its mysteries.

Action
To advance in your journey, you must confront the mysterious monsters known as Nue. Each Nue has a unique combat style, requiring strategic approaches to overcome. By timing your attacks carefully, you can unleash combos that deal high damage. With the coins earned from defeating foes, you can purchase new swords and shields to enhance your fighting abilities, gaining the strength needed to face even greater Nue threats.
